bibl.title: Bi'r Minayh. Report on the Survey 1998–2004.
bibl.note: nombr. figg. et 16 pll. coul. et 3 plans dépl.

P. xi: Preface (U.L.). - 1. Introduction (U.L.) [see in part. pp. 16-18: Late Antiquity occupation]. - 2. Geology of Bi'r Minayh region. - 3. Surveying and mapping at Bi'r Minayh. - 4. Prehistoric finds. - 5. Petroglyphs. - 6. Inscriptions [see in part. pp. 194-196: Greek dockets (Adrienn Almásy). Twenty-five dipinti sherds]. - 7. Architectural remains. - 8. Small finds. - Indices.
bibl.seg: Luft Ulrich (Ed.), Bi'r Minayh. Report on the Survey 1998–2004. (Studia Aegyptiaca. Series Maior. 3.)
Budapest, Archaeolingua, 2010, in fol., xii-319 pp., nombr. figg. et 16 pll. coul. et 3 plans dépl. ISBN 978-963-9911-11-6. €116.

P. xi: Preface (U.L.). - 1. Introduction (U.L.) [see in part. pp. 16-18: Late Antiquity occupation]. - 2. Geology of Bi'r Minayh region. - 3. Surveying and mapping at Bi'r Minayh. - 4. Prehistoric finds. - 5. Petroglyphs. - 6. Inscriptions [see in part. pp. 194-196: Greek dockets (Adrienn Almásy). Twenty-five dipinti sherds]. - 7. Architectural remains. - 8. Small finds. - Indices.
